Decode Categorical Features

decode_categorical_features.Rd

Converts numerical encodings of categorical features back to labels.

Usage

decode_categorical_features(data)

Arguments

data

A data frame with encoded categorical variables.

Value

A transformed data frame with categorical labels.

Examples

df <- data.frame(
  buying = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
  maint = c(4, 3, 2, 1),
  persons = c(2, 4, 5, 2),
  class = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
  safety = c("low", "med", "high", "low")
)
decode_categorical_features(df)
#>   buying maint persons class safety
#> 1    low vhigh       2 unacc    low
#> 2    med  high       4   acc    med
#> 3   high   med      5+  good   high
#> 4  vhigh   low       2 vgood    low
